welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Springfield, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to serving military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bradley International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Bradley International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brainard Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Brainard Airport caters to private and charter flights, with exclusive lounges and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
